definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: A compilation of aquaculture-related email discussion lists is also available on the site.
sentences.chinese: 還可在該網站看到有關水產業電子信函討論列表。

sentences.english: The aquaculture industry now provides almost half the fish eaten worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 水產業在提供了全球一半喫魚者的需求。

sentences.english: To an extent, this will have an impact on aquaculture.
sentences.chinese: 這將對水產業造成一定影響。

sentences.english: In aquaculture, young fish for stocking grow-out areas and ponds.
sentences.chinese: 種苗在水產業中，幼魚畜養在成長區與池塘。

sentences.english: In aquaculture, fish are raised in tanks or small bodies of water called ponds.
sentences.chinese: 在水產業中，魚類被飼養在水箱或池塘中。

sentences.english: The countries that abound in aquatic resources pay much attention to the development of aquaculture.
sentences.chinese: 水產資源豐富的國家都非常重視水產業的發展。

sentences.english: Aquaculture now produces 46% of the world's supply of fish.
sentences.chinese: 目前水產業承擔着世界魚類供應量的46%。

sentences.english: The agriculture aquaculture industry now provides almost half the fish eaten worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 目前水產業供應差不多全世界一半的食用魚。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: highest common factor HCF/greatest common divisor GCD
